remarks: Lemma for ~ nocvxmin .  Given two birthday-minimal elements of a convex class of surreals, they are not comparable.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jun-2011.)
statement:
nocvxminlem $p |- ( ( A C_ No /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A A. z e. No ( ( x <s z /\ z <s y ) -> z e. A ) ) -> ( ( ( X e. A /\ Y e. A ) /\ ( ( bday ` X ) = |^| ( bday " A ) /\ ( bday ` Y ) = |^| ( bday " A ) ) ) -> -. X <s Y ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y y z $.
